column4: hey guys -- I am having a problem with my VPN when I have a static IP assigned to my desktop. It's not the provider, but rather an issue with Linsys apparently
in /var/log/syslog I can see this -- with invalid source port 32768 on interface 'eth0.0'
can anyone help? I can't seem to find an answer
have you tried upgrading the firmware of your router?
